Title: Percy Liang: Stanford University Professor, technologist, and researcher in AI
Description:
We talk with Stanford University Professor Percy Liang. They discuss the challenges of conversational AI and the latest leading-edge efforts to enable people to speak naturally with computers.

Visit our site for more info: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/behind-the-tech

Listen and subscribe to other Microsoft podcasts at aka.ms/microsoft/podcasts
